New Records: Zack Wheeler pitched 6 innings with 4 hits, 2 ER, 9 K, and 3 BB
Key Match Events: Weston Wilson drove in the tiebreaking run with an infield single
Phillies completed a three-game sweep of the Rays
Phillies scored 3 runs in the 6th inning with a home run and an infield single
Game was decided in the 9th inning with a groundout
Miscellaneous Highlights: Attendance at Citizens Bank Park was 40,715
Game took 2 hours and 23 minutes to complete
